abstract: The decision could provide some relief for Amgen and Johnson & Johnson, which have already experienced steep drops in sales of the drugs because of concerns that the products might be making cancer worse.
snippet: The decision could provide some relief for Amgen and Johnson & Johnson, which have already experienced steep drops in sales of the drugs because of concerns that the products might be making cancer worse.
lead_paragraph: Medicare has eased up on some of its proposed restrictions on the use of popular anemia drugs made by Amgen and Johnson & Johnson.

headline.main: Medicare Eases Proposed Restrictions on Anemia Drugs Used by Cancer Patients
headline.print_headline: Medicare Eases Proposed Restrictions on Anemia Drugs Used by Cancer Patients

abstract: The health care conglomerate announced plans today to eliminate up to 4,800 jobs in a restructuring that it said would save $1.3 billion to $1.6 billion a year.
snippet: The health care conglomerate announced plans today to eliminate up to 4,800 jobs in a restructuring that it said would save $1.3 billion to $1.6 billion a year.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson, the health care conglomerate, announced plans today to eliminate up to 4,800 jobs as part of a restructuring that the company said would save $1.3 billion to $1.6 billion a year.
